嵞字的基本解释

嵞
tú
〔嵞山〕山名，同“涂山”，即“会稽山”，在中国浙江省。

嵞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《廣韻》同都切，平模，定。］
同“塗1”。亦作“峹1”。
(1)山名。详“嵞山”。
(2)古国名。
(3)道路。

嵞字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嵞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页316第39
【玉篇】達胡切。引書娶于嵞山。今通作塗。

嵞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嵞字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
An
tú
[Anshan] The name of the mountain is the same as "Tushan", that is, "Kuiji Mountain", which is located in Zhejiang Province, China.
An
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Guangyun" are cut in the same way, flat mold, fixed. ]
Same as "Tu 1". Also known as "峹1".
(1) The name of the mountain. Detailed "Anshan".
(2) Ancient country name.
(3) Road.
An
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嵞; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 316 39
[Jade articles] Dahuqie. Quoting the book to marry Yu Anshan. This pass is painted.
